content.p: Registration before 15 Apr 2022: RM 1000 for Malaysian participants USD 300 for International participants Normal registration after 15 Apr 2022: RM 1500 for Malaysian participants USD 400 for International participants Multiple papers by the same author: RM 500 (USD 160) for each additional paper Participate only (no abstract submission): RM 500 (USD 160) The conference fee will include e-proceedings, Welcome Party, Morning break, Lunch, Tea break and Gala Dinner (accommodation and transportation are excluded). For more info about the tentative itinerary on the day, please visit Programme. Notes: telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
